sentences.sentence: Regardless of whether goals are achievable or well within management's perceptions of the employee's ability, if employees see them as unachievable they will reduce their effort.
sentences.translation: 无论目标是否可以实现，或者是否符合管理层对员工能力的认知，如果员工认为这些目标不可能实现，那么他们就会减少努力。

sentences.sentence: Follow your dreams and you will achieve the unachievable.
sentences.translation: 追随你的梦想，那么你可以实现无法实现的。

sentences.sentence: Cheap, pesticide-free food is probably an unachievable objective.
sentences.translation: 也许，永远不会有便宜而未使用过农药的食物。
